extension.name: FavSlider Responsive Slideshow
extension.author: FavThemes
extension.description:
FavSlider is a free responsive Joomla! module that can be used to create a slideshow and customize each slide using the 90+ module settings. For more info, please see the demo and documentation for the FavSlider module.



Copyright © 2012-2017 FavThemes.

field.name: jquery_load
field.label: Load Joomla! jQuery
field.description: This setting loads Joomla!'s jQuery library. Choose NO if your website loads jQuery from an external source.

field.name: carousel_autorun
field.label: Slideshow Autorun
field.description: Choose to animate the slideshow automatically.

field.name: cycling_speed
field.label: Slideshow Cycling Speed
field.description: Insert the speed of the slideshow, in milliseconds. Insert only the value, for example: 5000, not 5000ms. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: caption_color
field.label: Caption Color
field.description: Set the caption color for the slideshow.

field.name: show_caption_effect
field.label: Show Caption Effect
field.description: Choose if a CSS3 effect for the slideshow caption should be displayed or not. Note that the CSS3 features are not supported by older browsers.

field.name: show_title
field.label: Show Caption Title
field.description: Choose if the caption title for the slideshow should be displayed or not.

field.name: title_color
field.label: Title Color
field.description: Choose the color for the title of the slideshow. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: title_font_size
field.label: Title Font Size
field.description: Insert the font size for the title using pixels, percent or em (for example: 14px, 120% or 1.2em, not 14). A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: title_line_height
field.label: Title Line Height
field.description: Insert the line height for the title using pixels or em (for example: 14px or 1.2em, not 14). The line-height property is used to modify the spacing between the lines of text. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: title_margin
field.label: Title Margin
field.description: Insert the margin for the title using pixels or percent (for example: 14px or 10%, not 14). The margin is a CSS property that sets the space around the content, including the padding. The margin can have from 1 to 4 values (top, right, bottom and left). A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: show_description
field.label: Show Caption Description
field.description: Choose if the caption description for the slideshow should be displayed or not.

field.name: description_text_color
field.label: Description Text Color
field.description: Choose the color for the description text. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: description_text_font_size
field.label: Description Font Size
field.description: Insert the font size for the description text using pixels, percent or em (for example: 14px, 120% or 1.2em, not 14). A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: description_text_line_height
field.label: Description Line Height
field.description: Insert the line height for the description text using pixels or em (for example: 14px or 1.2em, not 14). The line-height property is used to modify the spacing between the lines of text. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: description_text_margin
field.label: Description Margin
field.description: Insert the margin for the description text using pixels or percent (for example: 14px or 10%, not 14). The margin is a CSS property that sets the space around the content, including the padding. The margin can have from 1 to 4 values (top, right, bottom and left). A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: show_mobile_title
field.label: Show Mobile Caption Title
field.description: Choose if the caption title for the slideshow should be displayed or not on mobile devices.

field.name: show_mobile_description
field.label: Show Mobile Caption Description
field.description: Choose if the caption description for the slideshow should be displayed or not on mobile devices.

field.name: caption_hide
field.label: Mobile Caption Hide
field.description: Insert the maximum width of the device when the caption is no longer visible using pixels (for example: 420px not 420). For example, when setting the caption hide to 420px, the caption is no longer visible for any device with a width smaller than 420px. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: show_arrows
field.label: Show Arrows
field.description: Choose if the arrows for the slideshow should be displayed or not.

field.name: arrows_color
field.label: Arrows Color
field.description: Choose the color for the carousel navigation arrows. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: arrows_bg_color
field.label: Arrows Background Color
field.description: Choose the background color for the carousel navigation arrows. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: arrows_border_radius
field.label: Arrows Border Radius
field.description: Insert the border-radius for the arrows using pixels or percent (for example: 140px or 80%, not 140). For circle background shapes for arrows, choose the 50% value. Note that the CSS3 features are not supported by older browsers. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: show_indicators
field.label: Show Indicators
field.description: Choose if the bullet indicators for the slideshow should be displayed or not.

field.name: indicators_color
field.label: Indicators Color
field.description: Choose the color for the bullet indicators. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: indicators_active_color
field.label: Indicators Active Color
field.description: Choose the color for the active bullet indicator. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: show_slide1
field.label: Show Slide 1
field.description: Choose if this slide should be displayed or not.

field.name: upload_image1
field.label: Image 1 Upload
field.description: Upload the image for this slide. To clear the uploaded image, press the clear (X) button.

field.name: image_alt1
field.label: Image 1 Alt Text
field.description: Insert the text for the image Alt. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: image_link1
field.label: Image 1 Link
field.description: Insert the URL for the image. Note that the link must include http:// or https://. A blank field means that no link is assigned to the image.

field.name: image_link_target1
field.label: Image 1 Link Target
field.description: Choose the target for the URL of the image.

field.name: title_text1
field.label: Title 1 Text
field.description: Insert the text for the title inside the caption. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: description_text1
field.default: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.
field.label: Description 1 Text
field.description: Insert the text for the description inside the caption. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.
